celery_redis_sync
=================

1.1.1 (2022-09-27)
------------------

- Properly pass through SSL parameters for `rediss`


1.1.0 (2022-09-23)
------------------

- Also register for `rediss+sync://` URL


1.0.1 (2019-11-28)
------------------

- Declare Python-3 compatibility


1.0.0 (2017-10-05)
------------------

- Initial release
